root.name: Ridge Racer 6
root.description: The original tour de centrifugal in drift racing is leaving its imitators in the dust. Ridge Racer 6 for the Xbox 360 puts you behind the wheel of the latest, ultra-high performance machines. Punch the evolved nitrous system and leave more than the awe-inspiring scenery in your rear-view mirror.TracksAirport:Airport Lap, Aviator Loop, Southbay DocksIsland:Harborline 765, Island Circle, Midtown ParkwayHighlands:Highland Cliffs, Lakeshore Drive, Laketop ParkwayCoastal:Seacrest District, Sunset Heights, Surfside ResortRave City:Downtown Rave City, Rave City Riverfront, Crossbay TunnelSoundtrackValley of the Mind - Shinji HosoeNitro Mantra - Ayako SasoI Want You - Ayako SasoRoad Mauler - Rio HamamotoFloodlight - Sano "Sanodg"Drift Psychosis - Hiroshi OkuboSueno Del Mar - Asuka SakaiTrail of Light - J99Ultra Cruise - Tetsukazu NakanishiHighway Fusion - Shinji HosoeAcid Eutron #001 - Yu Miyake "Acid Eutron"Radiance - Sano "Sanodg"Photon Field - Koji NakagawaGalactic Life - KohtaExplorers - Hiroshi OkuboFind Your Way - Hiroshi OkuboChasing All My Dreams - Hiroshi Okubo
